```{r}
# Check if there are any duplicates in the data frame
if (any(duplicated(df))) {
  print("There are duplicates in the data frame.")
} else {
  print("No duplicates found in the data frame.")
}
```

```{r}
# Identify duplicated rows
duplicated_rows <- duplicated(df)

# Print the data frame with duplicated rows highlighted
print(cbind(df, is_duplicate = duplicated_rows))

# Remove duplicated rows
df <- df[!duplicated_rows, ]

# Print the data frame without duplicates
print(df)
```
